What's the historical average asset size of Islamic vs Conventional banks 


```{r}
clean_panel %>% group_by(Type, date) %>% summarise(Assets=mean(`Total Assets`)) %>% ggplot(aes(date, Assets, color=Type)) + geom_line() 
```

What's the historical average of investment to assets ratio of Islamic vs Conventional banks? 

```{r}
clean_panel %>% group_by(Type, date) %>% summarise(InvestmentRatio  = mean(Investments/`Total Assets`)) %>% ggplot(aes(date, InvestmentRatio, color=Type)) + geom_line()
```

What's the share of deposits to total liabilities of Islamic vs Conventional banks? 

```{r}
clean_panel %>% group_by(Type, date) %>% summarise(Deposits2Liabilities = mean(Deposits/`Total Liabilities`)) %>% ggplot(aes(date, Deposits2Liabilities, color=Type)) + geom_line()
```
What's the number of Islamic and Conventional Banks in our sample? 

```{r}
clean_panel %>% distinct(Type) 

```
